title: Citrus duck stir-fry
ingredients: ['2 boneless duck breasts, skinned and cut into strips', '1/4 tsp Chinese five-spice powder', '1 tbsp soy sauce', '2 tsp toasted sesame oil', '100ml orange juice', '2 oranges', '1 tbsp caster sugar', '1 tbsp red wine vinegar', '1 tsp cornflour', '1 1/2 tbsp vegetable oil', '4 spring onions, trimmed and diagonally sliced', '125g mange-tout, cut in half lengthways', '200g bean sprouts']
